entries.sold_item: You sold an item: %TO for %DI Credits. They have been deposited into your bank account.
entries.nothing_to_sell: You do not have anything I wish to buy.
entries.sell_loot_prompt: Select the item you wish to sell.
entries.privateer_only: You cannot equip this item because you are not a Neutral Pilot.
entries.imperial_only: You cannot equip this item because you are not an Imperial Pilot.
entries.rebel_only: You cannot equip this item because you are not a Rebel Pilot.
entries.loot_box_full: Your loot box is full so your ship cannot hold any more loot.
entries.looted_credits_you: You have looted a credit chip worth %DI credits.
entries.looted_credits: %TT has looted a credit chip worth %DI credits.
entries.no_group_leader: Your group leader is not available to auto loot. A random member has been chosen to receive the items.
entries.no_more_loot: Your inventory is full so you cannot receive any more loot.
entries.no_permission: You do not have permission to access that item.
entries.group_credit_payout: Your group member has split a credit chip.
